overview: On vacation in Montpellier, Raphaël Yeaahh meets a young man begging for cash on the street. Feeling generous and attracted to the beggar, he brings him to his hotel room to hook up. After Raphaël's generosity gets his wallet stolen, he files a complaint... only to end up fucking the policeman! When Raphaël returns home to Lille, he has so much fun showing and telling his best friend all about his vacation!
title: Premiere Aventure
